dict.acceptation: 在商业（闹市）区；到闹市区；

sent.orig: Downtown, please. I just arrived. I want to go downtown. I want to see the sights.
sent.trans: 我刚到。我要到市中心。我要看看值得看的东西。

sent.orig: I have decided to go downtown today.
Centennial Commemorative Statue be dedicated in downtown Chicago to provide a permanent recognition of Rotary's founding.
sent.trans: 此外，在芝加哥市中心将安置一座百年纪念雕像，做为扶轮创立的永久纪念。

sent.orig: I'll call the box offices downtown and see what the ticket situation is.
sent.trans: 我会打电话给市内几家剧场的票房，看看票的情况如何。

sent.orig: I used the less than half day exploring downtown to get myself oriented.
sent.trans: 那天余下的时间我用来在城里闲逛，找找方向感。
